DOC.brief_summary: This is to investigate Korean urologist's practice patterns for screening prostate cancer according to PSA level.
DOC.brief_title: Korean Practice Patterns for Screening PCA(Prostate Cancer)
DOC.detailed_description: This is to investigate Korean urologist's practice patterns for screening prostate cancer according to PSA level.
DOC.criteria: Male with PSA more than 2.5ng/ml from 1 Jan 2008 to 31 Dec 2008 Age less than 40 at PSA screening History of drug use which can affect level of PSA within 6months before PSA screening Subject who participate any other clinical trial
